description:
Suspend games and applications

Similar to the incredibly useful sleep/suspend function found in consoles like the Nintendo Switch and Sony PlayStation; suspend your game (and its resource usage) at any time, and resume whenever you wish - at the push of a button.
Maintenance release to keep things running smoothly.
Features
- i10n: add Simplified Chinese translation #246 (JohnsonRan)
Chores
- update linux metadata for new release (Merrit)
- vscode: run build_runner watch automatically on folder open (Kristen McWilliam)
- upgrade dependencies and fix deprecations #249 (Kristen McWilliam)
- bump version (Kristen McWilliam)
